alert.note: Alert for Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:50AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Spink County through 615 AM CDT... At 550 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burdette, or 14 miles southwest of Redfield, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Twin Lakes around 600 AM CDT. Redfield around 605 AM CDT. Ashton and Athol around 610 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for northeastern South Dakota.
